data.text:
For the bowl in DDA, see Colosseum.

The Colosseum Featured in Destruction Derby 2 Type Bowl Stage 2 Diameter 437.45 yd (400 m) Previous stage Red Pike Arena Next stage The Pit

The Colosseum is a bowl in Destruction Derby 2. Its motto is Veni Vidi Vici. It's the first unlockable bowl, rewarded when the player reaches Division 3 in the Championship.

The Colloseum is a bowl that has a gradual slope from the sides to the middle. Most of the bowl is surrounded by high rocks and events take place on a cloudy day.

Trivia[]
